next_steps.note: "Define a specific theme or subject matter for the poetry project (e.g., nature, love, loss, social commentary).",
"Brainstorm at least 10 potential poem ideas, including brief summaries of their intended focus and style.",
"Research and select 3-5 poets whose work resonates with the intended theme, analyzing their techniques and style.",
"Write a first draft of at least one poem, focusing on getting ideas down rather than perfecting language.",
"Establish a consistent writing schedule (e.g., 30 minutes, 3 times a week) to ensure consistent progress."
"Brainstorm 3 potential themes or concepts for the poetry (add to 'Ideas' list).",
"Draft a short free verse poem (approx. 10-15 lines) based on one of the brainstormed themes and add it to 'Progress'.",
"Review existing poetry resources (books, online sites) for inspiration and identify 2 techniques to try (add to 'Ideas').",
"Define specific criteria for evaluating completed poems (e.g., imagery, rhythm, emotional impact) to address potential issues proactively.",
"Schedule 30 minutes to dedicate solely to poetry writing/editing on [Date - e.g., November 9th] to maintain momentum."
